Uses of Package
enigma.core

Packages that use enigma.core
enigma.core Provides core Enigma classes used (knowingly or unknowingly) by every program running under Enigma. 
 

Classes in enigma.core used by enigma.core
Environment
          Encapsulates state information about the currently-running application, such as its environment properties and current path.
VirtualMachine
          Reflects a Java virtual machine which was spawned as a sub-process.
VirtualMachineConfiguration
          Parameters to use when invoking a new Java virtual machine.
VirtualMachineInstantiationException
          Thrown to indicate that a new Java virtual machine could not be instantiated with the specified configuration.
